title: Memento
creator_credit: Centre for Mass Communication of Columbia University Press and Stefan Sharff
brief_description: A fresh approach in the field of automobile safety, Memento uses picture and sound contrapuntally. Photographed in an automobile “graveyard”, the film presents a picture study of cars irreparably smashed in accidents, while the sound track reconstructs the voices of the participants of three particular accidents.
